About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm Osayande David. I've always loved learning, developing things and solving problems. In the quest of developing myself I found important tools: Internet and the web. And also I've always seen coding as some kind of super-power so I dived into web development. With tons of resources, courses, the amazing tutors and the community online combined with a lot of work, I became a web developer. I'm always learning and creating websites and web Applications to solve problems. Now I write about web development and self development in my website to give back to the community and help others.

Tools And skills:

For front-end

I use HTML, CSS, Javascript and Bootstrap framework to create responsive website and web Applications. I also utilize Sass for CSS Preprocessor (This project was coded in Sass).

Back-end/Database and CMS

I use PHP for the Back-end and Mysql for database. I use wordpress for content management and I combine HTML/CSS/JS & PHP to develop theme in wordpress to hone my skills. I'm currently developing a plugin in wordpress.

Other tools and frameworks to learn

I use photoshop for basic image editing and logo creation and I'm currently learning more advance concepts in photoshop. And I also will be diving in React framework for Js and larvel for PHP so I can build more advance and web Applications.
